April 29, 2017 D Oslo Brassfestival (Elite Division)
Oslo Brassfestival (Elite Division) 0 Other Oslo Brassfestival oslo-brassfestival
None
Gamle Museet, Oslo, Oslo County, Norway All Divisons: April 28th and 29th; Venue Friday: Kulturkirken Jakob
Adjudicators Saturday: Jan Arne Stavik Karlsen (gruppepris: tuba, euph/bar), Arfon Owen (gruppepris: horn, kornett), Morten Fagerjord (gruppepris: slagverk, trombone)
Best Cornet, Best Horn, Best Trombone & Audience 'Music Police' Prize: Krohnengen Brass Band Best Euph/Bari & Best Tuba: Jaren Hornmusikkforening Best Percussion: Molde Brass Band Best Instrumentalist: Margie S. Antrobus
